text: Good dog
author: mitchellreports

text: Justice dept official says no more indictments from Mueller and no sealed indictments. Other divisions of DOJ can pursue cases but Specisl Counsel is done
author: mitchellreports

text: And now @realDonaldTrump tweets he is reversing today’s minor Treasury sanctions on NK shipping companies for evading sanctions sending Kim Jong Un a direct message to deal with him. Makes a mockery of a law enforcement process and undercuts sanctions regime. China will cheer
author: mitchellreports

text: .@BeschlossDC: ...power between that power and either the president or those around him. That's something we haven't seen before and it's something that the founders of this country were terrified would happen. (2/2) #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@BeschlossDC: you go through all of American history, almost never have you had a president with this kind of serious accusation of a possible secret conspiracy with a hostile foreign (1/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@carlsonmargaret: to call upon Kellyanne to choose between her boss and her husband is not going to endear him to women other than that core base. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JonLemire: of course the reelection is in the forefront of the President's mind. I'm not sure the attacks on McCain or George Conway are an effort there to actually turn out voters. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@McFaul: ...that ISIS has been defeated, both in terms of people and in terms of ideas. ISIS is alive and well in Syria and Iraq and around the world and that fight will continue for, I think, years to come. (2/2) #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@McFaul: It's an achievement. We want to eliminate territorially the caliphate of ISIS. The effort to do so has been a success, started by the Obama administration, just to remind your listeners and viewers. It would be naive beyond belief to now assert (1/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@kwelkernbc: According to Sarah Sanders, it has been 100% contained. Acting DOD Secretary Shanahan traveling with President Trump, briefing him on this, he's also traveling with acting CoS Mick Mulvaney, they briefed him on this development. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@kwelkernbc: According to a note written by one of the reporters who is traveling with the President today, Sarah Sanders announced that the territorial ISIS caliphate has been 100% eliminated in Syria. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@McFaul:...That never happened. They blame deep state, thats kind of phrases they use. Trump is trying to do the right thing, and the deep state is getting in way, and so they hope that after the Mueller investigation is finally completed, they'll move on to that (2/2) #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@Mcfaul: in Moscow they're waiting to get beyond Mueller. They thought they were promised a lot of things, a lot of concessions from candidate Trump, including lifting of sanctions on a lot of their individuals and companies. (1/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@Mimirocah1: as everybody knows who has had a baby on the way, you don't know exactly what's going to happen. It's not being able to predict the moment that it's going to happen. But it's also the fact that once the baby comes, that's when the hard work begins. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@kwelkernbc: the anticipation is mounting. There's no doubt about that. The WH is ready with contingency plans, with statements. The President's legal team is ready. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: In Beirut @SecPompeo attacked Hezbollah as a terror group along with its Iranian sponsor while Lebanon's Foreign Minister defended Hezbollah, which is in coalition govt, as elected representatives of the Lebanese people. Lebanon official says press q's cancelled at U.S. request
author: mitchellreports
mitchellreports

text: This is awesome - only @BeschlossDC would find this gem!
author: mitchellreports

text: .@SecPompeo delivers diplomatic w⁦ins to @netanyahu⁩ in the Old City and ⁦@realDonaldTrump⁩ endorses Israeli sovereignty over Golan Heights in big election boost ⁦@NBCNightlyNews⁩ from Jerusalem
author: mitchellreports

text: Israel's PM gets a major policy victory from @realDonaldTrump who tweeted his decision as @SecPompeo was at Netanyahu home for dinner. All told a major political and military coup for PM facing election in 3 weeks
author: mitchellreports

text: Trump tweeting major policy change as @SecPompeo is at Netanyahu's home for dinner.  I had asked @SecPompeo if this was about to happen earlier today he said: "I don't have anything to say about that." This is a major military and political boon for Bibi with election in 3 weeks
author: mitchellreports

text: It would certainly seem so! Timing is everything
author: mitchellreports

text: .@mikememoli: I asked Jim Clyburn this and he was clear on his view, he said it would be a mistake for Biden or anybody else thinking about running to name running mate this early, that its seen perhaps as taking things for granted in terms of viability of own candidacy #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@mikememoli: last week VP had lunch with Stacey Abrams. That renewed some of speculation that that might be something he'll consider. What sources in the highest level of Biden operation tell me that yes, the potential option of choosing VP early in process is on table #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@mikememoli: I reported as far as a year ago that among the ideas to address the potential vulnerabilities in the race around his age would be announcing for just one term and also announcing the identity of his running mate. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@mikememoli: ... I think it's fair to say we've moved beyond will he or won't he run to when will he announce, how will he announce and how will he run. (2/2) #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@mikememoli: the fact that we're starting to see all this speculation like an early running mate announcement is indicative of fact that we've gotten to a new phase in Biden's own decision about race itself. (1/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@jwpetersNYT on President Trump: He's always been incapable of being a bigger person. So therefore he needs to make himself appear as if he is the bigger person by constantly tearing other people down. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@rickwtyler: ...saying, look, I'm willing to lose my seat and go back and be a citizen. It gets really tiresome that the only people speaking out are those who aren't running for reelection and are retiring. (2/2) #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@rickwtyler on Graham: Now that he's running for reelection in SC where Trump has a lot of supporters, he's doing the expedient thing. That's not leadership. At some point Republicans would do well if they were (1/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@rickwtyler: the Republican party I knew is gone, rest in peace. It's not coming back. and the only thing I can conclude about Lindsey Graham is when he was running for President and thought he could beat Donald Trump, it was easy and convenient to attack him #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: At the Western Wall Netanyahu and @SecPompeo insert prayers they’ve written in the wall, traditional practice. What’s different is for a top ranked US official to go with Israeli PM to the Wall a tacit recognition of Israeli sovereignty of area
author: mitchellreports

text: This is 1st visit of a US Secretary of State going with an Israeli PM to a synagogue built in the tunnels under the Muslim quarter of the old city, a deliberately strong statement of Solidarity with Netanyahu as he faces tough election in 3 weeks
author: mitchellreports
mitchellreports

text: There are no words
author: mitchellreports

text: .@bridgieleela Your father was widely loved and respected for his heroism, resilience and good works. Don’t let these gibes bother you they are meaningless
author: mitchellreports

text: .@SecPompeo lays wreath and rekindles flame at Yad Vashem Memorial in Hall of Remembrance, then signs guestbook “I am humbled to be present at Yad Vashem the hallowed place dedicated to keeping alive the memory of the Holocaust”
author: mitchellreports

text: .@SecPompeo and US Ambassador today at new US Embassy in Jerusalem former consulate now being expanded with new construction, moved from Tel Aviv when Trump administration recognized Jerusalem as Israel’s capital, a decision denounced by Palestinians and Arab leaders
author: mitchellreports

text: Facing a tough re-election fight for his fifth term, Israel's Prime Minister Netanyahu is getting some help from a friend - in the White House.
author: mitchellreports

text: Israel’s PM Netanyahu 3 weeks from tough election getting boost from ⁦@realDonaldTrump⁩ & ⁦@SecPompeo⁩, using Trump who’s popular in Israel in campaign ads and coming to White House for meeting and dinner next week. In 2015 Obama refused to see him close to election
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: I have a track record of getting things done. I'm delivering a powerful, compelling msg abt what we need to do in coming yrs to make sure we're smartest, healthiest, fairest and most prosperous nation on earth. I look forward to getting folks to compare candidates
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: ...I'm also confident when I'm on that debate stage, that I'm going to do well. I'm one of the few candidates in this race that has executive experience. (2/2) #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: We've seen support growing for my campaign, both in terms of the polling and fundraising.  I think that with help of a lot of the American people out there, I will be on that debate stage. (1/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: I'm going to do the hard work that it takes to reach the American people in every single state and talk to folks who don't feel like frontrunners themselves. I'm confident by the time the Iowa caucus comes around, I will be a frontrunner. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: ... I'm at in this race. I tell folks, you know, it doesn't faze me that 46 weeks before the Iowa caucus, that I'm not a frontrunner right now. (2/2) #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: I'm going to let Beto or any of the other candidates speak for themselves. And at the end of the day, the voters are going to decide what they want in a President. But, you know, I've been asked what do I feel like about where (1/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro:  I can't think of a single time in my life when I was the frontrunner. The people who were born and grew up where I grew up, like a lot of folks in America, didn't grow up as a frontrunner. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: I didn't grow up as a frontrunner. People ask me, what do you think about not being one of frontrunners right now? I've said that it's very early, that the voting in Iowa starts in just under a year, and that I haven't grown up in life as a frontrunner #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: ... that folks can have good job opportunities in this country, that children can get a good education, that folks will have good health care, that they can afford the rent. (2/2) #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: every minute he spends insulting somebody on Twitter or getting tied in knots over petty back and forths or playing golf, because this Pres has played more golf probably than last 3 combined, is minute hes not dedicating to making sure (1/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: when I travel around the country what I hear from folks when I visit places like Iowa, I hear from farmers how worried they are are about his erratic trade war w China. I hear from business owners in my own state, Texas, about all insecurity he's created #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: this President is a walking billboard of weakness and insecurity #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@HallieJackson: the President said something that a lot of people are picking up on, he's often referred to George Conway as Mrs. Kellyanne Conway, and people are asking why that's an insult, referring to a man by his wife's name. Thats something people picking up on #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro: I am going to go and do the hard work it takes to reach the American people in every state and talk to folks that don't feel like they are front runners themselves #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JulianCastro joins #AMR @kasie right now on @MSNBC!
author: mitchellreports
mitchellreports

text: .⁦@SecPompeo⁩ arrives Israel from Kuwait behind sked after touchdown in Amman despite frequent diplomatic practice of waivers on ban for commercial flights from Arab countries to Israel. Staff appeared surprised by unskedded  touchdown. AFOne flew Riyadh- Tel Aviv in 2017
author: mitchellreports

text: .@SecPompeo ducks q in Kuwait from US reporter about why State Dept no longer calls West Bank Israeli “occupied.” Kuwaiti FM avoids q about controversial US embassy move to Jerusalem. Next stop: Israel
author: mitchellreports

text: .@SecPompeo and Emir of Kuwait (far right) today reaffirming strategic alliance. What’s not on the table this trip as we head to Israel next? No talk about long awaited Middle East peace plan
author: mitchellreports

text: State dept officials arguing with Kuwaiti security to get us into Bayan Palace for photo op of @SecPompeo and Emir of Kuwait. Finally succeeded in getting one producer in to take notes for rest of traveling press
author: mitchellreports

text: .@SecPompeo meets local  business community at US  Embassy on brief visit to sign security and trade deals in trip focused on administration’s anti-Iran policy
author: mitchellreports

text: There are no words
author: mitchellreports

text: Flying into Kuwait tonight with @SecPompeo for meetings tomorrow then on to Jerusalem in the middle of Netanyahu’s hot re election campaign - will report from there tomorrow for #AMR thanks to @Kasie for filling in!
author: mitchellreports

text: .@kwelkernbc: it is just remarkable that you would see the President of the US continue to attack a senator months after his passing, particularly someone who was so highly regarded, who was referred to as an American hero. #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@SykesCharlie: I think there's a danger here for Dems who have been rightly critical of Trump for violating certain democratic norms, and yet almost on daily basis, theyre talking abt norms they would like to shatter. Packing supreme court, abolishing electoral college #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@Messina2012 on Gillibrand: There is criticism in dem community about her statements about Franken, about her criticism saying Bill Clinton should have been impeached. I think the way she handled that last night shows how long she's been thinking about running for Pres #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@Messina2012: VP Biden has a lead in early polls out of name ID and people loving what he did w Obama but Dems want 2 things more than anything: passion and new. The VPs challenge is going to be matching the kind of newness of Beto and excitement of Beto w his record #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports

text: .@Messina2012: I think this is the most wide open contest we have had in 30 years and I don't think there is a front runner #AMRstaff
author: mitchellreports
mitchellreports

text: A lovely man RIP
author: mitchellreports

text: .⁦@SecPompeo⁩ en route Kuwait before stops in Jerusalem & Beirut says will try to get Lebanon to disconnect with Iran-backed Hezbollah,is considering designating Iran’s IRGC as foreign terror group.Won’t meet with Palestinians who oppose Trump moving embassy to Jerusalem
author: mitchellreports

text: State dept will not provide transcript of @SecPompeo call with so-called “faith based media” not say who took part or what criteria were for participating. Usually transcripts are provided for all on the record interviews.
author: mitchellreports

text: State dept defending @SecPompeo limiting briefing today to “faith based media” saying they regularly do targeted media and “other engagements are more targeted or designed for topic, region, or audience-specific media.” Can’t recall religion being a test before for journalists
author: mitchellreports

text: Obviously FLYING to Kuwait! Sorry for autocorrect
author: mitchellreports

text:
We are trying to get answers -I’m with reporters on Pompeo plane in Kansas waiting to pick him up while he has been doing interviews and a speech before dying to Kuwait. We had no access to the call for “faith based reporters “
Whatever that means!
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JohnDelaney: One of reasons I got in so early, I think Im right person for the job and I have right vision for the country, but not enough ppl knew who I was or still know who I am. But Im pursuing kind of that oldfashioned early stage strategy. We're doing well in early states
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JohnDelaney: I actually think the race is wide open. If you talk to Democrats, most of them, overwhelming majority are undecided. They know some of us better than others which influences early polling. But what Dems understand is most important thing for us to do is beat Trump
author: mitchellreports

text: .@KimberlyEAtkins: It's definitely going to be a general election issue and right now the discussion about white nationalism seems to just be happening in the democratic party. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: Coming up NEXT on #AMR @MSNBC: @JohnDelaney
author: mitchellreports

text: .@SenJackReed on McCain: I think the President deserves to be criticized. Again, this is a gratuitous slap at an American hero, not based on the facts as you point out so correctly, and it's just a kind of almost a childish kind of fit that's being thrown. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: .@SenJackReed on Trump’s McCain tweets: It's despicable. John McCain is a hero… he always put the constitution above his own personal interests and he's the example we should be emulating, not criticizing. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: .@mikememoli: Part of what his (Biden) team will be doing in coming weeks is to make some final decisions abt nuts & bolts abt how theyre going to run this campaign, and they do recognize that fund-raising ability and small $ donation which is now a real litmus test in dem party
author: mitchellreports

text: .@theabstoddard: The democratic primary electorate doesn't know what it's doing yet and what it's for. We have a long way to go. He (Beto) is very astute to not take cemented positions this early. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: .@BetoORourke to @GarrettHaake live on #AMR: ...Every job pays has a living wage. World class public school because we pay our public school educators a living wage and squarely facing the challenge of climate change. (2/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@BetoORourke to @GarrettHaake live on #AMR: Let's not play his game. Let's keep our eyes on the prize, our ambitions, the goals by which I hope we'll be defined. Health care for every single American. (1/2)
author: mitchellreports

text: .@BetoORourke to @GarrettHaake live on #AMR: I think it begins with treating everyone with respect. Listening to everyone. Not taking anyone or any vote for granted and not writing anybody off, and the only way to demonstrate that is to show up, and to be here. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: .@GarrettHaake: ... and having three stops here today is laying down a marker to these other candidates about where he wants to compete and how he wants to do it. (2/2) #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: .@GarrettHaake: That is a luxury that O'Rourke has in part because of that money and in part because he doesn't have a day job. He doesn't have to be on Capitol Hill or running a state right now. He can be grinding it out in these states. Michigan doesn't vote for a year (1/2)
author: mitchellreports
mitchellreports

text: ‘The Lord will get me to the right place’: Pompeo opens door to future Kansas run https://www.kansas.com/news/politics-government/article227693029.htmll …                    He ws in Iowa at Futute Farmers of America this month     also

text: The President is again slamming #JohnMcCain for reporting what he had heard to the FBI - which already knew about the Dossier. Why would he keep going after a national hero who died months ago?
author: mitchellreports

text: Still...
author: mitchellreports

text: Hundreds 'plank like RBG' outside Supreme Court to celebrate Ginsburg's birthday
author: mitchellreports

text: Tonight— North Korea threatening to cut off talks and resume nuclear and missile testing two weeks after the failed summit in Hanoi @NBCNightlyNews
author: mitchellreports

text: Amb Bill Burns on North Korea: I think the underlying flaw here has been a diplomatic approach that's I think less focused on the hard work of diplomacy and more on a kind of diplomacy of narcissism #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: Amb Bill Burns: At Helsinki, he basically tried to ingratiate himself with Putin while throwing U.S. Intelligence and law enforcement agencies under the bus. That's seen by Putin and other autocrats around the world as weakness and manipulability. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: Amb Bill Burns: What the North Koreans are doing over the last 24 hours is sort of out of their classic playbook which is to use bluster and threats to try to position themselves for advantage. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: .@JoeCrowleyNY on Beto: He's scaring Bernie. Bernie's people are attacking him right now because they're afraid of what he brings to this race. He's new, he's vibrant, he's different. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: .@alivitali on Gillibrand: Her method is to talk policy and take every question, and she's not afraid to get into the weeds. Her campaign seems to be aware that she doesn't have star power that Beto and others in the field have, so they're trying to gin up some grassroots support
author: mitchellreports

text: .@GarrettHaake on Beto in Iowa: He defended the idea that he's not a true Progressive. This is something that he's been dinged a little bit on from the left. I was talking to a Bernie supporter here, he told me he very much wanted to ask that question about his progressive record
author: mitchellreports

text: NOW on #AMR @MSNBC: Ambassador William Burns, Former Deputy Secretary of State and author of the new book “The Back Channel”
author: mitchellreports

text: .@peterbakernyt: Just because the President has been slapped around by some of his fellow Republicans doesn't mean he doesn't continue to be a powerful figure in his party. Remember, a Gallup poll showed him to be at 90% support from Republicans. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: .@peterbakernyt: The Yemen vote, the Mueller vote indicate a growing independence on the part of at least some of these Republicans as we head deeper into President Trump's presidency. #AMR
author: mitchellreports

text: .@peterbakernyt: the Yemen vote, the Mueller vote indicate a growing independence on the part of some Republicans #AMR
author: mitchellreports
